name: Exposed Web Servers
description: Inventory all internet-facing HTTP/HTTPS assets to establish baseline visibility.

name: Known CVE Exposure
description: Identify assets with banners or fingerprints matching known vulnerabilities (e.g., Log4Shell, Exchange).

name: Exposed Admin Panels
description: Find publicly accessible admin consoles (phpMyAdmin, Jenkins, Webmin, etc.) that could enable direct takeover.

name: Expired Certificates
description: Detect expired SSL/TLS certificates that reduce trust or allow interception.

name: ICS / IoT Presets
description: Identify exposed Industrial Control Systems and IoT devices (Modbus, DNP3, BACnet, MQTT) vulnerable to disruption or tampering.

name: Docker API Exposed
description: Detect exposed Docker API endpoints that could allow unauthorized container access or deployment.

name: Exposed Remote Services (RDP, SSH, Telnet, FTP)
description: Find exposed remote administration and file transfer services: RDP (3389), SSH (22), Telnet (23), and FTP (21).

name: Exposed Database Services
description: Detect unprotected or internet-exposed database services: MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, Memcached, Cassandra, MSSQL, Oracle, CouchDB.

name: Find hosts by SSL/TLS certificate subject
description: Search for hosts using SSL/TLS certificate subject (CN - Common Name). Useful for finding all hosts using a specific certificate or domain.
